organizations.name: McKinsey & Company
quotes: The consulting firm McKinsey & Company studied seven large countries and concluded that digital ID systems could add between 3 and 13% to their gross domestic product.

organizations.name: World Bank Identification for Development (ID4D)
quotes: The World Bank Identification for Development (ID4D) initiative has identified ten Principles of Digital Identification covering inclusion, design and governance “to improve development outcomes while maintaining trust and privacy”.

organizations.name: Modular Open Source Identity Platform (MOSIP)
quotes: Building on the positive and cautionary lessons of early adopters, the Modular Open Source Identity Platform (MOSIP) is developing open source code countries can adapt to design their own systems.
Among the most successful is Estonia, where citizens can use their digital ID to access over 2,000 online government services.
In China, for example, an estimated 10 million small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) sell on the Taobao platform;
